data.lyric:
[ti:Talk Up (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake / Jay-Z]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.57]Talk Up (Explicit) - Drake/Jay-Z
[00:01.23]Producer：DJ Paul
[00:02.08]Drake：
[00:02.94]Ayy ayy
[00:06.19]Lot of 6's in here tonight
[00:08.14]Yeah yeah ayy
[00:16.30]Ten of us we movin' as one
[00:19.71]I'm so proud of who I've become
[00:23.19]You might think I've taken some lumps
[00:26.65]Only if we talkin' 'bout sums yeah
[00:29.36]Intentions are pure they cannot tell me relax
[00:32.85]My mentions are jokes
[00:34.52]But they never give me the facts
[00:36.36]This isn't that can't be ignorin' the stats
[00:39.85]Based off of that they gotta run me the max
[00:43.23]They gotta run me the max
[00:44.93]They gotta double the racks
[00:46.68]They had it set up for real
[00:48.16]But they didn't come with the slaps
[00:51.19]When I heard the sh*t I was skippin' through that
[00:54.73]If I get it trippin' it's no comin' back
[00:56.80]I don't understand these n**gas gotta adapt
[01:00.24]You know where I'm at I put the 6 on the map
[01:03.61]Your shorty was bent she wanted to vent
[01:05.44]I promise it fell in my lap
[01:07.04]My money is young my problems are old
[01:08.67]I promise I'm bridgin' the gap
[01:12.28]You know what I'm sayin'
[01:14.03]Woo
[01:15.13]Ayy ayy
[01:18.39]Yeah you know what I'm sayin'
[01:22.33]Gyeah gyeah gyeah gyeah
[01:24.33]N**gas provoke this sh*t ain't a joke man nobody playin'
[01:27.83]He's at the top and he's at the top but nobody stayin'
[01:31.12]These n**gas around but they ain't around
[01:32.69]You know what I'm sayin'
[01:34.60]Say that they down when they sh*t is down
[01:36.06]You know what I'm sayin'
[01:38.09]Yeah you know what I'm sayin'
[01:42.42]Ayy ayy yeah
[01:46.53]You know what I'm sayin'
[01:47.75]JAY-Z：
[01:50.19]Yo get close enough to HOV smell like a kilo still
[01:54.60]First album 26 I ain't need no deal
[01:58.14]Already a hood legend I ain't need no shine
[02:01.49]First Rollie flooded out I ain't see no time woah
[02:05.51]Stand-up n**gas we only duckin' indictments
[02:08.93]Dope boys Off-White lookin' like soft white on 'em
[02:14.03]Heh you know what I'm sayin'
[02:15.78]We in the buildin' we came for a billion ain't nobody playin'
[02:19.16]Live every word that I'm rappin'
[02:20.74]Say I lost 90 bricks and it happened
[02:22.16]You probably wouldn't believe everything that you seein' right now
[02:24.48]If it wasn't live action
[02:25.89]I ain't on the 'Gram they record who I am
[02:29.29]God to these d**e boys how do you not be a HOV fan
[02:32.88]I'm what Meech shoulda been
[02:34.31]I'm what Supreme didn't become
[02:36.11]If Alpo didn't snitch n**gas'd be like Young
[02:39.82]I got your President tweetin' I won't even meet with him
[02:43.15]Y'all killed X and let Zimmerman live shhh s-streets is done
[02:46.66]Drake：
[02:48.46]You know what I'm sayin'
[02:51.00]Ayy ayy yeah
[02:55.17]You know what I'm sayin'
data.trans:
[ti:Talk Up (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake / Jay-Z]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.57]//
[00:01.23]//
[00:02.08]//
[00:02.94]//
[00:06.19]今晚这里有很多Three 6 Mafia组合的人
[00:08.14]//
[00:16.30]我们十个人动作如一
[00:19.71]我为自己的成就感到骄傲
[00:23.19]你可能觉得我损失了一些东西
[00:26.65]只要我们说到总数的时候
[00:29.36]目的很单纯 他们不能告诉我放松点
[00:32.85]我提到的只是一些笑话
[00:34.52]但他们从来不告诉我事实
[00:36.36]事情不是那样的 不能忽略统计数据
[00:39.85]因为这个 他们得给我最高的报酬
[00:43.23]他们得给我最高的报酬
[00:44.93]他们得把报酬翻倍
[00:46.68]他们把这个弄成真的了
[00:48.16]但却没有落到实处
[00:51.19]当我听说这些时 我正准备离开
[00:54.73]如果我受到了欺骗 我是不会回头的
[00:56.80]我不明白这些伙计们是怎么适应的
[01:00.24]你知道我在哪儿 我把多伦多放在地图上
[01:03.61]你的妞弯下身子 她想要发泄
[01:05.44]我发誓 我已经没有兴致了
[01:07.04]我的钱还没热乎 问题还是那些老问题
[01:08.67]我保证我能填补空白
[01:12.28]你知道我在说什么
[01:14.03]//
[01:15.13]//
[01:18.39]你知道我在说什么
[01:22.33]//
[01:24.33]伙计们挑起事端 不是开玩笑 兄弟 没人跟你玩
[01:27.83]他到达了巅峰 但是没有人能留下
[01:31.12]这些伙计们在周围 但他们不在附近
[01:32.69]你知道我在说什么
[01:34.60]说了 当一切都结束时 他们也玩完了
[01:36.06]你知道我在说什么
[01:38.09]你知道我在说什么
[01:42.42]//
[01:46.53]你知道我在说什么
[01:47.75]//
[01:50.19]离Jay-Z近一点 他的味道就像是*** 
[01:54.60]26岁发行第一张专辑 我不需要交易
[01:58.14]我已经是街区的传说了 我不需要什么光芒
[02:01.49]第一块劳力士手表进水了 我看不到时间
[02:05.51]站起来 伙计 我们只是在躲避控告
[02:08.93]**男孩 Off-White品牌的衣服穿在他们身上很柔软
[02:14.03]你知道我在说什么
[02:15.78]我们在这里屋子里 我们是为了钱来的 没人跟你玩
[02:19.16]我的每一句说唱都充满活力
[02:20.74]我说了我丢了90公斤的** 真的发生了
[02:22.16]你可能不会相信你现在看到的一切
[02:24.48]如果不是真情实景的话
[02:25.89]我没有拿格莱美奖 他们把我记录下来了
[02:29.29]你们这些人竟然不是Jay-Z的粉丝
[02:32.88]我就是米什应该成为的人
[02:34.31]我就是Supreme没有成为的人
[02:36.11]如果Alpo没有告密 伙计们就会和Young一样
[02:39.82]我让你们的总统发了推文 我甚至都没见过他
[02:43.15]你们这些杀了XXXTENTACION  却留下Zimmerman一条命 街区完蛋了
[02:46.66]//
[02:48.46]你知道我在说什么
[02:51.00]//
[02:55.17]你知道我在说什么
